Notes: This json file describes tests to be run by LANforge system
has no correlation to the --instance_name , instance name is used
as a unique identifier for tha chamber-view test run

args_list: --raw_line "profile_link 1.1 STA-AUTO 32 'DUT: USE_DUT_NAME Radio-2' NA wiphy1,AUTO -1 NA"
--raw_line "profile_link 1.1 STA-AC 1 'DUT: USE_DUT_NAME Radio-2' NA wiphy1,AUTO -1 NA"
-sta 11abg -t Voice -p 48 -m 106 -e WEP -q Yes -b 1 2 5.5 11 -pre Long -s N/A -co G.711 -r Yes -c Yes
-sta 11n -t Voice -d 17 -ch 40 -gu 800 -high 9 -e WEP -q Yes -ip 5 -mc 42 -b 6 9 12 24 -m 1538 -co G.729 -pl Greenfield -cw 15 -r Yes -c Yes

use_ssid_idx=1 --mgr LF_MGR_IP --radio wiphy1 --ssid SSID_USED --passwd SSID_PW_USED --security SECURITY_USED --test_duration 15s --output_format excel --layer3_cols name,tx_bytes,rx_bytes,dropped --traffic_type lf_udp --debug
